quoteText: <li>Is harmful, fraudulent, deceptive, threatening, harassing, defamatory, obscene, offensive, graphically violent, pornographic, or otherwise objectionable
title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

tosdr.case: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Service state that, "You represent, warrant, and agree that you will not contribute any Content or User Submission (each of those terms is defined below) or otherwise use the Services or interact with the Services in a manner that . . . is harmful, fraudulent, deceptive, threatening, harassing, defamatory, obscene, offensive, graphically violent, pornographic, or otherwise objectionable."
